messages.title: Change Britain’s future
messages.content: Vote for Jenny Wilkinson: a voice for Sutton Coldfield. Opposing cuts to funding for Sutton's schools. Fighting to save our NHS. A local voice for Sutton Coldfield in Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s place in Europe. Now we are the only party fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal. A 'hard Brexit' will devastate our economy.
Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds they need – by putting a penny on income tax and ring-fencing the £6 billion revenue.

Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to people. Schools across the Midlands are set to lose millions from their budgets in cuts that are neither necessary nor fair.

The Lib Dems are greener. We owe it to our children to fight climate change. We say that net CO2 emissions must be reduced to zero by 2050 and have a plan of how to do it. As well as greener energy, we want to protect and improve our countryside and green spaces.
The Liberal Democrats exist to create a fair, free and open society where no-one is enslaved by poverty, ignorance or conformity.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s place in Europe. Now we are the only party fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal. A 'hard Brexit' will devastate our economy.
issues.education: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to people. Schools across the Midlands are set to lose millions from their budgets in cuts that are neither necessary nor fair.
issues.environment: Green: but practical! The Lib Dems are greener. We owe it to our children to fight climate change. We say that net CO2 emissions must be reduced to zero by 2050 and have a plan of how to do it. As well as greener energy, we want to protect and improve our countryside and green spaces.
issues.health: Everyone knows our health and care services are struggling. Only the Liberal Democrats would give them the funds they need – by putting a penny on income tax and ring-fencing the £6 billion revenue.

community.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to people. Schools across the Midlands are set to lose millions from their budgets in cuts that are neither necessary nor fair.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jenny Wilkinson was born and brought up in Sutton Coldfield and is now raising her own three young children in the town. Jenny has a business background, working since 2000 as a Forensic Accountant, combating fraud and corruption. For me, being involved in politics is about supporting everyone to make the most of their lives. I'm devastated by the damage being done to our country by the current government, so I'm fighting for the Liberal Democrat values of fairness, freedom and tolerance.

endorsements.endorsement: I have witnessed first-hand the devastating human cost of the failure to deal with mental health. Thanks to the Lib Dems this is finally being taken seriously.
Employers and young people both need more apprenticeships. The two million apprenticeships completed since the Lib Dems came into Government have made a huge difference.

quotes.text: I have witnessed first-hand the devastating human cost of the failure to deal with mental health. Thanks to the Lib Dems this is finally being taken seriously.
Employers and young people both need more apprenticeships. The two million apprenticeships completed since the Lib Dems came into Government have made a huge difference.

images.caption: Jenny Wilkinson along with other supporters
